code: protected static HazelcastInstance getFirstInstance() {     return hzOne. }
protected static HazelcastInstance getSecondInstance() {     return hzTwo. }
@BeforeClass public static void setUpHazelcastCluster() {     hzOne = Hazelcast.newHazelcastInstance(createConfig("hzOne")).     hzTwo = Hazelcast.newHazelcastInstance(createConfig("hzTwo")). }

private static Config createConfig(String name) {     Config config = new Config().     config.setInstanceName(name).     config.getNetworkConfig().getJoin().getMulticastConfig().setEnabled(false).     config.getNetworkConfig().getJoin().getTcpIpConfig().setEnabled(true).addMember("127.0.0.1").     return config. }
